Is there really a real reason why we can't have this?

item.title: Why can't we have avatars or pics in our signatures?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:25, topic:408405”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=509688.msg3698197#msg3698197 date=1312579635]

I’m pretty sure Frell meant signature images.

But I’m not talking about server storage or server bandwith usage, I’m talking about the clients bandwidth.

I can see how dignatures could cause a problem, but avatars shouldnt be, as i dont have but ‘1x’ internet on my phone and it loads find.

No I am not saying we should adjust it to allow URLs for avatars. Currently the avatar is the only way i can tell who is a mod on my phone.
[/quote]What do you mean? You can’t see the ‘Moparscape Moderator’ thing? Because that’s not an avatar, and not all mods have avatars.

Again, the reason you probably don’t have a problem is because you’re in the US, most speeds here aren’t TOO bad (unless you are REALLY old), and because we don’t have a whole bunch of avatars yet Some places even have a limit on your internet bandwidth (how much you can download per month), so having to download images every time you load a new user with an avatar would be a pain.

But that’s besides the point, because bandwidth isn’t the main reason we have them disabled anyway.

No, no badges show up, no stars. I can only see the name, avatar, and post. Not even the code bbc box’s work. One real issue though is when I am on moparcraft on my phone, when I click “home” at the bottom it brings me to moparscape lol.[/quote]
Same problem!
